name: Land Hover  web app

des.overviewOne: MERN stack web app ,users and admin have separated full responsive  dashboard
des.overviewTwo: Logged in client get dashboard , book apartments and also give feedback
des.overviewThree: Implement  secured route and JWT, Admin can manage all orders and booking status For admin role email: admin@admin1.com   password:123456

technology: ReactJs , NodeJs(Express Js) , MongoDB (atlas Cloud ) , Firebase , Heroku ,Material UI
overview: Land Hover is Full stack web app project , Which has full responsoive dashboard for admin and user .My moto was to create a web app where people can buy and secured authentic property by our service . For the purpose of security , JWT and secured admin route had been established here . The server side was hosted in heroku. mongoDb database was used to store data . User can also review my site . And they also book apartment after log in

name: Doctors Portal Web app

des.overviewOne: Developed a  full stack Doctors website with firebase authentication
des.overviewTwo: After login client can book a date for visiting doctor by their preferences. user can select a date from a calender for his doctor schedule.
des.overviewThree: Admin  can manage all orders and change the booking status add a new schedule for all users.

technology: ReactJs , NodeJs(Express Js) , MongoDB (atlas Cloud ) , Firebase , Heroku , Material UI
overview: This is a Doctors portal web app. The web app is fully functional and dynamic with many more functionalities , such as firebase auth is used for user security. Only logged in user can book doctors. The server side was hosted in heroku. mongoDb database was used to store data . User can also review my site . And they also book a doctor for him after log in

name: Travel web app

des.overviewOne: Developed a  full stack Travel app with firebase authentication
des.overviewTwo: After login client can book places by their preferences
des.overviewThree: Admin  can manage all orders and change the booking status add new places but for testing purpose all users are admin

technology: ReactJs , NodeJs(Express Js) , MongoDB (atlas Cloud ) , Firebase , Heroku , React bootstrap
overview: This is a travel managment app which is designed by the inspiration of original travel website which is materialized my Ritesh Agarwale. The web app is fully functional and dynamic with many more functionalities , such as firebase auth is used for user security. Only logged in user can book places .No Server side technology is used . This web app is based on Front End

name: Medical website

des.overviewOne: Front-end focused web app,provides information to a user about services and doctors
des.overviewTwo: User can create account  manually or google sign with firebase authentication
des.overviewThree: Logged in User can see all hospital services  and make appointment from doctors

overview: Health care is a hospital managment web app . In this web app you can log in with GOOGLE or Custom Email Address. without sign in you can not see doctors list as well as can not make appointment . This is only front end based web app .

name: Arabic Learning web app

des.overviewOne: Front-end focused web app,provides information to a user about arabic learning. In this web app you can find a place whare you are learn arabic.

overview: This is a Arabic learning web app . In this web app you can find a place whare you are learn arabic. This is only front end based web app .
